stages.name: Attachments or URLs Found in Email?

actions.name: Search Threat Intel for Attachment MD5s

stages.name: URL or MD5 are Known Bad

actions.name: Notify Submitter that Email is Malicious
actions.message:
Thank you for submitting a suspicious email to the CIRT.
We have determined that the email was malicious, and are taking
remediation actions.
For more information, you can check the status of the incident
here: {{Link}}
Thank you,
Acme CIRT
actions.subject: Phishing Email Confirmed

actions.name: Flag as Fully Automated to Closure

stages.name: URL and MD5 are Known Safe

actions.name: Notify Submitter that Email is Safe
actions.message:
Thank you for submitting a suspicious email to the CIRT.
We have determined that the submitted e-mail is safe.
Please continue to submit suspicious emails to phishing@acme.com
Thank you,
Acme CIRT
actions.subject: Suspicious email is safe

actions.name: Change Status to Closed - False Positive
Flag as Fully Automated to Closure
